message:
Dear {{doc.employee_name}},

This is to inform you that your probation period has been extended for an additional {{"extension_period"}} months, effective from {{"extension_start_date"}}.

Please find attached the probation extension letter with complete details. We encourage you to discuss any concerns with your reporting manager.

Regards,
{{doc.company}} HR Team
name: Probation Extension Letter Notification
subject: Extension of Probation Period - {{doc.employee_name}}
